oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Coin Flip to Decide Who Hosts Blues Bowl
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph from 11/25/1963 which features three unidentified African American males allegedly flipping a coin to decide who will host the Blues Bowl.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hooks Bros.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Item scanned by John Yackulics; Description by Margie Robertson
